content: 29 10 2015 new update with several helpful changes released the frog has gone away many thanks to denise user rodatzi on ravelry for her creative enthusiasm while crocheting and testing my pattern and for her very helpful notes you can find them here 1 and here 2 september 2015 attention please there jumped a frog over the pattern a better version will be released soon baskenmütze cup cake rose = eine süße verführung das zentrale muster diese baskenmütze ähnelt einer aufblühenden rose es besteht aus reliefstäbchen beret cup cake rose = a sweet temptation the central model of this beret looks like a blossoming rose it is composed of front post double crochets us terms are used the crochet hook 3 5 mm is metric system 1 http //www ravelry com/projects/rodatzi/beret-cup-cake-rose 2 http //www ravelry com/projects/rodatzi/beret-cup-cake-rose-2
